verses.verse: And these <S%H428><s%> are the countries which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> inherited <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> distributed for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to them.

By lot <S%H1486><s%> was their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> for the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> and for the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe. <S%H4294><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> on the other side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> but unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

For <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> therefore they gave <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> save <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in, with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and for their substance. <S%H7075><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did, <S%H6213><s%> and they divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in Gilgal: <S%H1537><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenezite <S%H7074><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thou <S%H859><s%> knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> me and thee in Kadesh-barnea. <S%H6947><s%>

Forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> was I <S%H595><s%> when Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me from Kadesh-barnea <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6947><s%> to espy out <S%H7270><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> and I brought <S%H7725><s%> him word <S%H1697><s%> again as <S%H834><s%> it was in <S%H5973><s%> mine heart. <S%H3824><s%>

Nevertheless my brethren <S%H251><s%> that <S%H834><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me made <S%H853><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melt: <S%H4529><s%> but I <S%H595><s%> wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> on that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whereon <S%H834><s%> thy feet <S%H7272><s%> have trodden <S%H1869><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and thy children's <S%H1121><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou hast wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath kept me alive, <S%H2421><s%> <S%H853><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he said, <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> even since <S%H4480><s%> <S%H227><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> while <S%H834><s%> the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> wandered <S%H1980><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> and now, <S%H6258><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am this day <S%H3117><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H1121><s%>

As yet <S%H5750><s%> I am as strong <S%H2389><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I was in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me: as my strength <S%H3581><s%> was then, <S%H227><s%> even so is my strength <S%H3581><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> for war, <S%H4421><s%> both to go out, <S%H3318><s%> and to come in. <S%H935><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> heardest <S%H8085><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> how <S%H3588><s%> the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> were there, <S%H8033><s%> and that the cities <S%H5892><s%> were great <S%H1419><s%> and fenced: <S%H1219><s%> if <S%H194><s%> so be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will be with <S%H854><s%> me, then I shall be able to drive them out, <S%H3423><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said. <S%H1696><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, and gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> <S%H853><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Hebron <S%H2275><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenezite <S%H7074><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kirjath-arba; <S%H7153><s%> which Arba was a great <S%H1419><s%> man <S%H120><s%> among the Anakims. <S%H6062><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> from war. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4421><s%>
